review: This was bought as a gift for a friend because my family already owns 4. We love these. They work better than the smart features on most smart TVs (especially older vizios). We have these on Samsung, Vizio, and Sony smart TVs and even one that travels for hotels. Funny to say, one of our favorite features is just the screen saver pictures. They are awesome! If you don't own one of these, for <$35, what are you waiting for?
author: Neil Townley
